    • Method Detail

      • newHomework

        public java.lang.Boolean newHomework(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> homeworkMap)
                              throws java.lang.NumberFormatException,
                                     ValidationException
        Create a new homework from the input data
        Parameters:
        homeworkMap - key-value pairs corresponding to the homework class
        Returns:
        true if saved; false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.lang.NumberFormatException - thrown when homeworkMap contains an invalid number for id, deadlineWeek, assignmentWeek
        ValidationException - thrown when at least one value is invalid

      • extendHomeworkDeadline

        public java.lang.Boolean extendHomeworkDeadline(java.lang.String homeworkId,
                                                java.lang.String newDeadlineWeek)
                                         throws java.lang.NumberFormatException,
                                                ValidationException
        Extend the homework's deadline if it isn't due yet
        Parameters:
        homeworkId - id of the homework
        newDeadlineWeek - week number
        Returns:
        true if updated; false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.lang.NumberFormatException - thrown when homeworkId is not a valid number
        ValidationException - thrown when the new deadline is invalid
